about_me_paragraph: 5th-semester student of Analysis and Systems Development at Facens and Front-end Developer at Lionsoft, experienced in HTML5, CSS3, ReactJS, TypeScript, NextJS, JavaScript, and Tailwind. My journey began in technical support, where I gained valuable skills in communication, teamwork, and problem-solving, providing quick and effective solutions for clients. Currently, as a Front-end Developer, I focus on creating efficient, responsive, and attractive user interfaces. I am always looking to improve my skills and learn new technologies to stay updated with the trends in software development.
